entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
